skills.name: COAL FLING
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• 75% Chance to Silence the target for 2 turns.
• Damage dealt increased based on your DEF and MR stats.

skills.name: COLD SNAP
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 75% Chance to inflict Furious Burn for 2 turns on all enemies.

skills.name: BARRIER
desc: • Grants Cyclone Shield to self for the duration of the battle.
• If Cyclone Shield is not present at the start of your turn, Freeze, Blind, or Heal Block all enemies..
